text: Nils Erik Adam Larsson (born 12 November 1992) is a Swedish professional ice hockey defenceman. He is the alternate captain of the Seattle Kraken of the National Hockey League (NHL). He was selected fourth overall by the New Jersey Devils in the 2011 draft. Larsson was the first defenceman and first European- trained player to be drafted in 2011. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish ice hockey defencemen Category:Seattle Kraken players Category:New Jersey Devils players Category:Edmonton Oilers players
title: Adam Larsson
